results.title: In Chicago Mayor’s Race, a Former Teacher Rises With Union Support
results.abstract: Brandon Johnson, a county commissioner who once taught in struggling neighborhoods, soared in the polls after an endorsement and donations from the Chicago Teachers Union.

results.title: Uganda Passes Strict Anti-Gay Bill That Imposes Death Penalty for Some
results.abstract: The legislation, which now goes to the president, also calls for life in prison for anyone engaging in gay sex. Policies to stifle gay rights have been on the rise in several African nations.
des_facet: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

multimedia.caption: Ugandan legislators debated the anti-gay bill in Parliament in the capital, Kampala, on Tuesday. The president has yet to show any sign that he will reject the measure.
Ugandan legislators debated the anti-gay bill in Parliament in the capital, Kampala, on Tuesday. The president has yet to show any sign that he will reject the measure.

results.title: Tacos, lumpias y embutidos en el menú de la cocina de juguete
results.abstract: Muchos padres dicen que esos juguetes han hecho que sus hijos se interesen más por probar nuevos alimentos y conocer su significado cultural.

multimedia.caption: Sergio, el hijo de 6 años de Rebecca Rivera, juega con alimentos de juguete como sushi y pizza en su casa de Patterson, Nueva York. Juguetes más diversos como estos han hecho que los niños estén más dispuestos a probar nuevas comidas.

results.title: Behind the Story: Can U.F.W. Make a Comeback?
results.abstract: The United Farm Workers union hopes a California law can help it regain lost influence.

results.title: A Stage Adaptation of ‘Smash’ Is Setting Its Sights on Broadway
results.abstract: Producers including Steven Spielberg have been exploring several possible incarnations of the decade-old TV series. Now they have a plan.

multimedia.caption: Megan Hilty as Ivy Lynn in the television series “Smash,” which is being developed into a Broadway musical years after it was canceled.

results.title: My New Boyfriend Offered to Pay Off My Credit Card Debt. Help!
results.abstract: A reader doing battle with 25 percent annual interest is tempted by her boyfriend’s offer of an interest-free loan, but she worries it may be inappropriate to accept.

results.title: The A.I. Chatbots Have Arrived. Time to Talk to Your Kids.
results.abstract: Artificial intelligence can make adults nervous, but experts say exploring it as a family is the best way to understand its pros and cons.

results.title: A 90-Year-Old Tortoise Named Mr. Pickles Is a New Dad of Three
results.abstract: The radiated tortoise is the oldest animal at the Houston Zoo. He has been with his partner, Mrs. Pickles, since she arrived in 1996. The mom and hatchlings are doing fine.

multimedia.caption: Radiated tortoises rarely produce offspring, which made news of their hatchings even more exciting, the zoo said.
Radiated tortoises rarely produce offspring, which made news of their hatchings even more exciting, the zoo said.

results.title: In a Brother Act with Putin, Xi Reveals China’s Fear of Containment
results.abstract: Instead of focusing on a solution to the war in Ukraine, the Chinese leader’s visit to Moscow reinforced China and Russia’s shared opposition to American dominance.

results.title: Not Your Daddy’s Freud
results.abstract: A new generation of analysts and patients are embracing the father of psychoanalysis – in magazines and memes and many hours on the couch.

results.title: John Wick Sure Has a Lot of Friends for a Lone Assassin
results.abstract: How does a taciturn solo killer have so many pals? The films’ creators can’t really explain, but each character has a raison d’être in this world.

multimedia.caption: John Wick (Keanu Reeves), center, and his pals the Bowery King (Laurence Fishburne), left, and Winston (Ian McShane) in installment No. 4.

results.title: Lo que Google Bard puede —y no puede— hacer
results.abstract: El nuevo chatbot de Google está siendo probado por una cantidad limitada de usuarios. Estas son sus diferencias y semejanzas con los otros sistemas de inteligencia artificial recientes.

results.title: $250,000 Homes in Wisconsin, Pennsylvania and Alabama
results.abstract: A Craftsman bungalow in Kaukauna, a rowhouse in Philadelphia and a midcentury ranch house in Florence.

results.title: Credit Suisse’s Investment Bank Is Slowly Disappearing
results.abstract: UBS is weighing whether and how to end a deal that would have preserved most of its rival’s investment bank, as part of its takeover of the ailing Swiss lender.
results.byline: BY ANDREW ROSS SORKIN, RAVI MATTU, BERNHARD WARNER, SARAH KESSLER, MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED, LAUREN HIRSCH AND EPHRAT LIVNI

results.title: The Monks in the Middle of Russia’s War in Ukraine
results.abstract: A war-fueled rift between the living clerics loyal to Moscow and those loyal to Kyiv is coming to a head.
